channel.title: How to make a login pic?
channel.description: Well I'm trying to make my owned login pic. I've made a custom one but idk how to resize or horizontally flip half of the picture so that it sets right. :(

item.title: How to make a login pic?
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

[quote=“frostscapeserver, post:1, topic:341521”]Well I’m trying to make my owned login pic. I’ve made a custom one but idk how to resize or horizontally flip half of the picture so that it sets right. :([/quote]you can do both of those in the most unprofessional editor… paint

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a login pic?
